posts.post_title: Ty Cobb PSA 4 Green Portrait for Sale **Photos
posts.post_content:
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to sell my PSA 4 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

I am asking $2750 as I see them on ebay for $3000 but the price is negotiable so please feel free to make an offer. Thanks
Paypal or postal money order accepted accepted please and 3% included in the above price.

Doug

PS: Member name used to be Colorado723 but I changed it back to Brass23 with help from Leon. Thanks Leon
